verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'kon pathe āilā, sanātana?'
teṅha kahe,--'samudra-pathe, kariluṅ āgamana'

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord inquired; kon pathe—through which path; āilā sanātana—you have come, Sanātana; teṅha kahe—he replied; samudra-pathe—on the path by the sea; kariluṅ āgamana—I have come.
translation: When the Lord inquired, "By which path have you come?" Sanātana Gosvāmī replied,"I have come on the path along the beach."
